title: 1.0 Send System Notification
name: SendSystemNotification
description: This endpoint allows administrators to send system notifications to all users or a specific user.

Parameter.description: Target audience for the notification (must be 'all' or 'specific_user')
User ID of the specific user (required when target is 'specific_user')

examples.title: Request Example - All Users:
Request Example - Specific User:

Success 200.description: Indicates if there was an error (always false for success)

examples.title: Success Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 201 Created
{
  "error": false,
  "message": "Notification sent successfully",
  "notification": {
    "_id": "60f5a13d6b1f0e12345abcde",
    "title": "System Maintenance",
    "message": "The system will be down for maintenance on Saturday from 2-4 AM",
    "type": "system",
    "target": "all",
    "sourceUser": "60f5a13d6b1f0e12345abcdf",
    "createdAt": "2023-07-19T10:30:15.123Z",
    "updatedAt": "2023-07-19T10:30:15.123Z"
  }
}

title: 1.0 User Signup
name: UserSignup
description: This endpoint allows users to sign up for the blog platform. It validates user input, generates an OTP for email verification, sends the OTP to the user's email, and creates the user in the database with a pending verification status.

examples.title: Request-Example:

Success 200.description: Indicates the success of the operation (false if successful).
A success message indicating that the signup was successful and OTP has been sent.
The newly created user's information (excluding sensitive data like OTP and password).

examples.title: Success-Response:

Error 4xx.description: Indicates the failure of the operation (true if failed).
A message describing the reason for the failure.

Parameter.description: An array of tags associated with the blog post (mandatory).
A GitHub link associated with the blog post (optional).

A URL to the thumbnail image of the blog post (optional).
The publication status of the blog ("published" or "draft").

examples.content:
{
  "title": "My First Blog",
  "content": "This is the content of the blog.",
  "tags": ["Node.js", "API", "Blog"],
  "category": "Technology",
  "gitHubLink": "https://github.com/user/repo",
  "attachments": ["https://example.com/file1.pdf"],
  "thumbnail": "https://example.com/image.jpg",
  "status": "published"
}

title: 5.0 Delete Blog (Soft Delete)
name: deleteBlog
description: This endpoint allows an authenticated user to perform a soft delete of a blog they authored. The blog is marked as deleted but not permanently removed from the database.

Parameter.description: The ID of the blog to delete.

examples.title: Request Example:
examples.content: DELETE /blogs/60f5a13d6b1f0e12345abcde

examples.title: Request Header Example:
examples.content: Authorization: Bearer <jwt_token>

Success 200.description: A message confirming the blog was soft-deleted.

examples.title: Success Response:
Invalid Blog ID Error Response:
Blog Not Found Error Response:
Internal Server Error Response:

title: 7.0 Get Distinct Authors
name: getAuthors
description: This endpoint retrieves a list of distinct authors who have published blogs. The response includes the author's email, full name, and ID.

examples.title: Request Example:
examples.content: GET /blogs/authors

examples.title: Request Header Example:
examples.content: Authorization: Bearer <jwt_token>

examples.title: Success Response:
NoAuthorsFound Error Response:

name: getBlogById

description: This endpoint retrieves a specific published blog by its ID.

examples.content: GET /blog/60f5a13d6b1f0e12345abcde

examples.title: Request Header Example:
examples.content: Authorization: Bearer <jwt_token>

examples.title: Success Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
  "error": false,
  "blog": {
    "_id": "60f5a13d6b1f0e12345abcde",
    "title": "My First Blog",
    "content": "This is the content of the blog.",
    "tags": ["Node.js", "API"],
    "category": "Technology",
    "gitHubLink": "https://github.com/user/repo",
    "attachments": ["https://example.com/file1.pdf"],
    "thumbnail": "https://example.com/image.jpg",
    "status": "published",
    "publishedAt": "2025-01-21T12:34:56.789Z",
    "_author": "60f5a13d6b1f0e12345abcd9",
    "frequency": 5
  }
}

examples.title: Error Response:

title: 2.0 Get Blog Posts with Filters and Pagination
name: getBlogs

Parameter.description: The page number to fetch. Default is 1.
The number of blog posts per page. Default is 10.
The sorting method. Options are recommended (based on user history) and byDate (based on creation date).
An array of tags to filter blogs by (optional).
An array of categories to filter blogs by (optional).
A search query to match blogs by title using a case-insensitive regex (optional).

examples.title: Request Example:
examples.content:
{
  "page": 1,
  "limit": 10,
  "sortBy": "recommended",
  "tags": ["Node.js", "API"],
  "categories": ["Technology"],
  "searchQuery": "blog"
}

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
  "error": false,
  "blogs": [
    {
      "_id": "60f5a13d6b1f0e12345abcde",
      "title": "My First Blog",
      "content": "This is the content of the blog.",
      "tags": ["Node.js", "API"],
      "category": "Technology",
      "gitHubLink": "https://github.com/user/repo",
      "attachments": ["https://example.com/file1.pdf"],
      "thumbnail": "https://example.com/image.jpg",
      "status": "published",
      "publishedAt": "2025-01-21T12:34:56.789Z",
      "_author": "60f5a13d6b1f0e12345abcd9",
      "frequency": 5
    }
  ]
}

examples.title: Error Response:

title: 6.0 Get Draft Blogs
name: getDraftBlogs
description: This endpoint retrieves a paginated list of draft blogs authored by the authenticated user. Draft blogs are those with a status of "draft".

Parameter.description: The number of blogs to retrieve per page.

examples.title: Request Example:
examples.content: GET /blogs/drafts?page=2&limit=5

examples.title: Request Header Example:
examples.content: Authorization: Bearer <jwt_token>

examples.title: Success Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
  "error": false,
  "draftBlogs": [
    {
      "_id": "60f5a13d6b1f0e12345abcde",
      "title": "Draft Blog Title",
      "content": "This is a draft blog content...",
      "tags": ["tag1", "tag2"],
      "category": "Category Name",
      "status": "draft",
      "_author": {
        "email": "user@example.com",
        "name": "John Doe",
        "profileImage": "http://example.com/image.jpg"
      },
      "createdAt": "2024-12-01T12:00:00.000Z",
      "updatedAt": "2024-12-02T12:00:00.000Z"
    }
  ],
  "totalCount": 15,
  "page": 2,
  "limit": 5
}

examples.title: No Draft Blogs Error Response:
Internal Server Error Response:

title: 4.0 Update a Blog
name: updateBlog
description: This endpoint allows an authenticated user to update their blog. The blog must belong to the authenticated user.

Parameter.description: The ID of the blog to update.

examples.title: Request Example:
examples.content:
PUT /blogs/60f5a13d6b1f0e12345abcde
{
  "title": "Updated Blog Title",
  "content": "Updated blog content",
  "tags": ["Node.js", "Express"],
  "category": "Technology",
  "gitHubLink": "https://github.com/user/repo",
  "attachments": ["https://example.com/file1.pdf"],
  "thumbnail": "https://example.com/image.jpg",
  "status": "publish"
}

Success 200.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful (true if successful).

examples.title: Success Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Blog updated successfully",
  "blog": {
    "_id": "60f5a13d6b1f0e12345abcde",
    "title": "Updated Blog Title",
    "content": "Updated blog content",
    "tags": ["Node.js", "Express"],
    "category": "Technology",
    "gitHubLink": "https://github.com/user/repo",
    "attachments": ["https://example.com/file1.pdf"],
    "thumbnail": "https://example.com/image.jpg",
    "status": "published",
    "_author": "60f5a13d6b1f0e12345abcd9"
  }
}
